long_description: The classic Haiku Bucket Shoulder Bag holds just about anything you can stuff in it, and still manages to look elegant. 2 carry options: removable handle and removable shoulder strap, both adjustable. Main compartment has top-zip closure. 2 external zip pockets: 1 front, 1 back. 3 internal pockets: 2 slip-in, 1 zip. Haiku Bucket Shoulder Bag is made from recycled material and features contrast-color trim.
short_description: The classic Haiku Bucket Shoulder Bag holds just about anything you can stuff in it, and still manages to look elegant.
